title: "Will 2024 be the year of the robot lawn mower? I'm not so sure"
excerpt: "We’ll have to wait and see how this pans out in 2024. Robot lawn mowers have traditionally struggled in terms of object recognition – crashing against garden furniture or tumbling into flower beds. Identifying boundaries and obstacles has been an issue."
